description.en: A compact mini tote that can be carried by hand or worn crossbody. Features a structured body, reinforced handles, and a detachable adjustable shoulder strap—ideal for daily essentials and casual outings. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), size, logo patch, lining, pockets, strap hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 轻便迷你托特斜挎包，可手提也可斜挎。包身挺括，提手加固，并配可拆卸可调节肩带，适合日常随身与休闲出行。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、肩带五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon / canvas-like fabric (customizable; recycled options available)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙/类帆布面料（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
肩带：可拆卸可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：挂钩与 D 环等（电镀颜色可定制）

en.Use Case: Daily essentials, casual outings, travel organizer
en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, logo, lining, pocket layout, strap & hardware, packaging

zh.适用场景: 日常随身、休闲出行、旅行收纳
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、Logo、内里、口袋结构、肩带五金、包装
